name: Greenskin Orc Elf Hunter
skills: Acrobatics +8, Intimidation +2, Nature +2, Perception +5, Stealth +8 (+11 in forests), Survival +5

traits.name: Arboreal Hunter
traits.desc: The greenskin orc has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when in temperate or warm forests.

traits.name: Favored Enemy
traits.desc: The elfhunter has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks to track or notice any variety of elf or fey creature.

traits.name: Forest Hunter
traits.desc: When the elfhunter hits a creature with a weapon attack, the creature takes an extra 3 (1d6) damage (included in the weapon damage).

traits.name: Land Stride
traits.desc: The elfhunter can move through nonmagical difficult terrain without using extra movement and can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them even if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The elfhunter is an 8th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following ranger spells prepared: * 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, detect magic, jump, longstrider * 2nd level (3 slots): find traps, pass without trace, silence

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The green orc elfhunter makes two attacks with its longsword or two with its longbow.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d8 + 1d6 + 3) slashing damage or 12 (1d10 + 1d6 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (1d8 +1d6 + 5) piercing damage.
